subdisciplines.name: Planetary Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of planets and other celestial bodies, as well as their formation and evolution.

subdisciplines.name: Planetary Geology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the geology of planets and other celestial bodies, including their formation, structure, and surface features.

subdisciplines.name: Planetary Atmospheres
subdisciplines.description: The study of the atmosphere of planets and other celestial bodies, including their composition, dynamics, and interaction with solar radiation.
